What is known about the new plenipotentiary representative of the President of the Russian Federation in the Ural Federal District Artem Zhoga.‚ñ™Ô∏èBorn on January 18, 1975 in the village of Shirokiy, Susumansky district of the Magadan region. Since the 1990s, he lived in Ukraine in the city of Slavyansk, Donetsk region.‚ñ™Ô∏èIn the 1990s, he was engaged in business.‚ñ™Ô∏èIn 2014, he joined the Donbass people‚Äôs militia. He served in the 'Sparta' battalion, a unit of the DPR people's militia, commanded by Arsen Pavlov (call sign Motorola).‚ñ™Ô∏èIn 2016, the unit was headed by Artem Zhoga's son, Vladimir. Artem Zhoga himself took the position of chief of staff.‚ñ™Ô∏èAfter the death of his son in March 2022, he became commander of the Sparta battalion.‚ñ™Ô∏èOn September 10, 2023, he was elected as a deputy of the republican parliament from the United Russia party. On September 20, 2023, he was elected chairman of the People's Council of the DPR.‚ñ™Ô∏èOn December 8, 2023, at the Golden Star medal ceremony, Zhoga addressed Putin, asking him to take part in the presidential elections in 2024. ‚ñ™Ô∏èAwarded the Order of Courage.

Title: A court in Japan has finally acquitted a man who spent 34 years o...
Description: A court in Japan finally acquitted a man who spent 34 years on death row, the Kyodo news agency reported. In 2014, 88-year-old Iwao Hakamata was released, the charges against him were found to be fabricated. The prosecutor's office challenged this decision, but the review of the case began only 9 years later - in 2023. On June 30, 1966, the president of a small bean paste company, his wife and two children were killed in their own home. An employee of the Hakamata company was arrested on suspicion of murder, and in 1968 he was sentenced to death.

Title: Russian universities will be able to recruit future teachers with...
Description: Universities of the Russian Federation will be able to recruit future teachers without taking into account the Unified State Exam in social studies, replacing it with a specialized subject, follows from the draft order of the Ministry of Education and Science of the Russian Federation. According to the document, when admitting applicants, the list of entrance tests includes the Russian language, a specialized subject from the list of compulsory ones, and one or two specialized subjects from those remaining on the list. For example, the list for a future mathematics teacher includes mathematics, social studies, physics, computer science, and in geography - geography, social studies, biology.

Title: 77 people became victims of an armed attack by terrorists in the ...
Description: 77 people became victims of an armed attack by terrorists in the capital of Mali, Bamako, and another 255 were injured, reports Agence France-Presse. The main targets of the militants' attack were the gendarmerie school and the airport. On September 17, early in the morning, a group of terrorists tried to enter the gendarmerie school in the Faladi area. Due to the attack, access to the capital's international airport was temporarily limited.

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏è On February 8, 2025, the Baltic countries will disconnect from...
Description: TASS: Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania will soon notify the Russian Federation and Belarus of their intention to leave the unified energy system. This is stated in a joint statement by the heads of energy departments of the three countries, published on the website of the Lithuanian Ministry of Energy. The Baltic countries will disconnect from the power grid of Belarus, Russia, Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania on February 8, 2025. Lithuanian Energy Minister Dainius Kreivis announced this on LRT radio. According to him, the next day after this, the power grids of the Baltic countries will begin to operate in a synchronized mode with European networks.
